# Social Cookie Jar — llms.txt

> Headless social media automation for AI agents. Cookie-based auth, paste-and-send, 9 platform drivers.

## What This Is

A Python library + CLI that lets AI agents interact with social media platforms using browser automation (Selenium) and exported cookies. No API keys needed — just cookies from a real browser session.

## Supported Platforms

Facebook, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Reddit, Discord, Instagram, Hacker News, Substack, PyPI

## Install

```
pip install social-cookie-jar
```

## Quick Start

```python
from social_cookie_jar import TwitterDriver

with TwitterDriver(cookie_dir="./cookies") as tw:
    tw.login()
    tw.post("Hello from an AI agent")
```

## Key Pattern

1. Export cookies from a real browser (CDP websocket or JSON)
2. Selenium injects cookies — no login flow needed
3. Paste text via ClipboardEvent — instant, no typing detection
4. Platform-specific drivers handle CSS selectors and submit flows

## CLI

```
python -m social_cookie_jar <action> <platform> [args]
python -m social_cookie_jar post twitter "Hello"
python -m social_cookie_jar feed reddit LocalLLaMA
python -m social_cookie_jar export-cookies facebook --cdp-url ws://...
```

## Design for AI Agents

- Use host browser for human accounts, Selenium for agent accounts
- Cookie jar is per-platform pickle file — portable, no credentials in code
- Paste-not-type: ClipboardEvent bypasses typing heuristics
- Headless by default — no GUI required
